data.name: OST & Comic Book
data.detailed_description:
Original Game Soundtrack composed by Michael Donner

Track list :
1. Welcome on Board
2. Good Morning
3. Full Power Mode
4. Fire On Board
5. Reactor Shutdown
6. Ventilation
7. Specimen
8. Last Chance
9. No Escape
10. S.A.E
11. Grand Finale

+ COMIC BOOK



Far-Out Comic Book drawn by Andrew Dubrovsky.
Story written by Alexander Hagelstein.
Short story in comic book show us the situation that happened before you start the game.

data.short_description: Package include Original Game Soundtrack by Michael Donner and short Comic book story written by Alexander Hagelstein and drawn by Andrew Dubrovsky

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 - 64 bits
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVIDIA GeForce 9800GTX / ATI Radeon HD 3xxx series
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
